contact.heroDesc: Find quick answers to common questions below. If you need more help, use the contact information at the end of the page.
contact.a1: ROFORMAN develops robotics-related technologies and products for industrial and applied environments, including platform and integration support.
contact.q2: How can I request a product demo or partnership discussion?
contact.a2: Please send a short overview of your company, use case, and timeline to our contact email. We will route your inquiry to the relevant team.
contact.q3: Do you support technical collaboration with universities or research labs?
contact.a3: Yes. We are open to technical collaboration and joint research discussions depending on the project scope and alignment.
contact.q4: Where should I send technical support or integration questions?
contact.a4: Include your product/model information, issue summary, and any logs or images available in your email so we can respond more efficiently.

careers.step1Body: Send your resume and a short introduction to info@roforman.com (portfolio / GitHub link recommended for engineering roles).
